{colour_start|debuff}OVERHEAT{colour_end} Each of the Dredge’s skills in Mech mode cause her {colour_start|debuff}Heat Level{colour_end} to increase, going into {colour_start|debuff}Overheated{colour_end} at 100.
When the Dredge uses a skill while {colour_start|debuff}Overheated{colour_end}, she suffers 6 (+1/level) self damage
and debuffs herself for +20% DMG Taken until she leaves Mech mode.
Modes can be switched using Eldritch Core skill
Does not change modes at combat end.

{colour_start|notable}Amber Fumigation{colour_end}: {colour_start|white}ɘɘɣɣɥɡɡɡɡ{colour_end} 95 ACC/-70% DMG/+2% CRT Ignores {colour_start|prep_round}Prep Round{colour_end} ACC Reduction, {colour_start|amberblighted}Amberblight{colour_end} Target, +15% {colour_start|debuff}Heat{colour_end}

"To fight monsters, we became them..."

Pillar of Steel
Omnipistol Blast
We dredges do not operate together in squadrons.
Two dredge units would only impede one another.
That would be tactically disadvantageous.
There is no safe place but my machine!
The empire has fallen, and I am soon to follow!
Not even this technology can save me!
We are no regiment! We are no heroes!
What am I doing in this forsaken place?!
We cannot withstand their assaults!
Change formation- quickly!
Cover my retreat!
Reposition! Defend me!
Orders? What are my orders?!
I cannot execute that maneuver!
It would leave me exposed!
If we continue to march like this, it will be to our demise!
No meal can save a damned regiment...
How much longer before another banner falls?
Medic! Where is a damned medic?!
Our defenses are collapsing!
Cover me! Someone- anyone!
A soldier's luck always runs out eventually!
Was I hit? Am I all right?
I'm too old to keep moving like this!
Their agility trumps ours, we must fall back!
We are outmatched against such deftness!
Brace for a counter-attack!
The ranks are falling!
Their force is too great- fall back!
We cannot repel attacks of such power!
This onslaught cannot be held off forever!
Retreat- before they can rally!
Now! Our opportunity to flee!
Stay in formation before you doom us all!
I need orders first!
Do not change formation!
Hush, it would reveal our location...!
I fear I cannot manage it!
What if I alert the enemy?
Only a saboteur could lead us to this disaster...
Has one of those beasts escaped the cataclysm only to lead us?
One of you must have caused all this... or more?
Who is even issuing our orders anyway?
A turncoat... somewhere amongst us!
I'd recognize the stench of a spy anywhere!
Before me. I'll provide overwatch...
New formation! My orders!
The leading ranks suit you better...
Only a fool or a deceiver would order such a maneuver...
How dare you try to shepherd me like a lamb!
When I see a leader, I'll begin taking orders.
A capable dredge can think for herself!
Would you dare question my decades of combat?!
I've not made it this far without thinking on my feet.
I saw to it that the rations were untampered with...
I'm not saying one of you is a conspirator, however...
If one of you so much as approaches my machine...
A child could predict the ambush waiting behind us!
It would take a fool to turn their back to the enemy!
We have no one to cover our retreat, you buffoon!
Our tactics were predicted...
How? How could they have read my actions...?
I saw one of you signal the attack!
If you think that I'd let you lull me so easily...
I noticed how none of you stepped in to help me.
The attack was feigned! A diversion?!
That posture- I could see you holding back!
It evaded before you even initiated, conspirator!
I'm too old to be so easily deceived.
It's a surface wound- a mere feint!
That's a rather extreme reaction for a feigned attack.
I was not aware that I would be deploying with thespians.
I see that dagger in your hand!
Cease your clandestine murmurings!
A taste of what I do to traitors.
I've trained enough troops to know when one is holding back.
Right. Best to not strike your *true* allies.
I'm not sure if this is deceit or incompetence.
And when did you start giving marching orders?
Stay in formation, or be declared a saboteur!
Displace me not, infiltrator.
I trust only the supplies I pack for myself.
You rely on your own supplies and I'll rely on mine.
Why don't *you* use it first?
The wounds will close on their own without your meddling.
Do you have your medic's sigil? I thought not.
Just an opportunity for you to settle my bones in backward!
This was not a part of our orders.
Your insidious curse will not deceive me.
These old bones know when a traitor is afoot.
Suspicious time to ask for a favor...
I think you're asking much an old woman...
I'm preoccupied keeping overwatch.
Trying to strike during my moment of vulnerability?
Try it, traitor. We'll see what happens.
The moment I turn my back...
These are not the rations I packed!
I'll eat once I've seen you all survive the meal...
Poisoned cheeses, a timeless tactic.
My machine and I have yet more battle scars to earn!
Fear not the sword nor pike, they are but a part of glory!
The two of us embrace the brunt of your assault!
At my age, you'll learn to appreciate valor in wounds.
Scars and scraps! Blood and oil!
A lifetime of battle- the rush of struggle!
Step aside, child. I'm ready for this.
Change formation! Give me point!
Get out of my way! The carnage awaits!
Aha! The pain, the joy!
I care for the risk more than the calculation.
Lose yourself in it! Bask in the peril!
I'm beginning to wonder if the machine's plating is *too* dense.
I must admire the brutality of our enemies.
Today will be majestic. Rife with violence!
Right here, you fiends! I'm waiting!
What, do you need me to beg?
Let's get to the point, already!
You can't have bloodshed without shedding blood!
Let's make this a fair fight!
I'll even make this opportune for you!
I'll retreat when I've had my fill!
Hush, child. The grown-ups have matters to attend.
Are you mad? The battle has only just begun!
Was that all?
Hrmph. Disappointing.
I expected... more.
Pathetic, really. I'm hardly moving.
Where's the thrill against foes this merciful?
What a pity.
That's it! Revel in the scars of battle!
Each wound is a ribbon, each gash is a medal!
If you're not able to withstand, then begone!
I'm precisely where I ought to be, thank you.
I believe stationary is the best stance for me.
Child, you'll miss the view!
Save it for the less able-bodied.
Do not disrupt my contentment!
When I need your care, I will kindly ask.
Do not squabble with me, your "aid" is not needed.
I'm rather pre-occupied if you had not noticed.
A more astute nurse would note that I am perfectly fine.
I am performing exactly as I need.
And dull the challenge? I should say not.
I have all the fortitude I need, child.
You may not like it, but this is what optimal performance looks like.
Reprimand me, if you so feel.
Do not interrupt my musings.
I'm delighted to fight exactly as I am.
Cowardice comes in many forms, and I will not be coddled.
Be away from me. Pester one of those fragile fools.
Nothing like an empty stomach to amplify the senses.
I prefer fighting lean.
It would only slow me down, and I've much to do ahead!
First my homeland is destroyed, and now I'm HERE?!
My seasoned talents are wasted on you louts!
I should be in a house polishing my medals, not in this hellpit!
The might of Ostvengr technology is squandered on you whelps.
What I wouldn't give to replace you with proper soldiers...
How have I come to fight for my life among such primitives?
I've fought enough wars to think for myself!
Let the invalids be your lapdogs!
A true dredge does not rely on orders!
To escape the cataclysm, just to be led to ruin by fools...
Let's see if you lot can even keep pace with me on-foot.
If you need to cry, keep it quiet so I may sleep.
Strike at thrice that speed, and the empire might have initiated you.
Finally, someone almost shows some backbone.
Good, someone who can avoid disappointing me for a moment.
The empire wouldn't let the likes of you be even a chimney sweep!
I bring Ostvengr tek to this land, and this is what I see in exchange?
I see now what a horrid series of choices I've made...
What was even the point in hiring you?!
This is what constitutes a soldier here? THIS?!
They must have really been desperate for someone like me to come along...
Stay in formation, fool!
I'm ordering you to stay put!
Hold position. That is a direct order!
You need to be whipped into shape!
You know what we did to lazy soldiers?
I'll end anyone to show cowardice here!
Stop pestering an old woman to do your bidding.
If you need tending to, then tend to yourself.
Begone, child.
A capable dredge looks after herself.
I have maintenance to perform, leave me be.
I have doubts about your proficiency.
Isn't anyone else going to pull their weight?
Why am *I* being put through the brunt of this?!
Are you going to make an old woman do all the hard work?
Need I do *everything* around here?
Valor is for those of us who put in the effort.
Remember, you couldn't do this without ME!
The point position claims the glory!
I don't care for all this waiting around.
Out of my way, the next medal has my name on it.
I've done my part, cover me!
I do believe I've earned a respite.
Shield me, devil-fodder!
These old bones have earned a rest.
Why don't you children take care of matters for once?
I'm due a break.
I'll follow my own orders for a moment.
A dredge doesn't bow her head to such paltry orders.
Pathetic. Let me show you how a winner does things.
At my age, I shouldn't need to do all the heavy lifting.
One of you children really ought to do some actual work for once.
At least I can put the success of this mission under my name.
Guard your squadron leader already!
Protect me! Beauty before age!
Where is my support?!
I claimed that one, you fool!
Fine, I'll let you have *one*. This time.
Who ordered you to fire on my target?
Must I do everything myself?!
Oh, excellent, even *more* work I have to do.
At least I won't need to share credit with any of you.
You'd make an old woman do all the work?
Leave the tent-pitching to my subordinates.
I do believe I've earned the right to relax.
I'm past my prime, aren't I?
The aches are finally catching up to me...
Bones and pistons... both are getting a bit tired.
Every soldier falls eventually...
So many years of this... so many years.
Suit or not, this is a bit much for me...
If I go out, I'll damn-well be on my feet.
Make sure my memorial has the right medals.
Duty calls...
Get in there. I have little left to give.
This is a fight for the youthful.
New formation. I'll be out of your way.
I need to... catch my breath...
Ack! I think I pulled something in my neck!
Augh! My hand is cramping...
I'll go down on my own terms.
Orders? What orders?
I can at least make this choice for myself.
Marching... always marching...
Being a soldier isn't all praise and medals, you know...
This machine and I have been through so much. Too much...
<wheezing loudly>
No one lives forever. Let's make it good.
Let us dance.
This blasted leg of mine!
Let's hurry this along.
We're never going to make it out of this!
And go where? They have us surrounded.
If they have an ambush, we'll be trapped. Might as well save our breath.
It doesn't make much difference *which* battle I die in.
Leave some supplies for the reinforcements that find our bodies.
You think *that* is just going to make everything better?
No sense in being wasteful.
Stow it. What I need right now is for this fight to end.
Leave it for the others, I'm not worth your efforts.
I'll do as I am.
I don't have the energy for it, I'm afraid.
It's a bit too much for me.
It's not enough...
I simply don't have it in me anymore.
Please, just let me rest.
My joints are killing me...
Can't this wait?
Leave me be, I need some sleep.
It takes more than that to save a soldier's life.
This gruel tastes like mud.
I simply don't have the stomach for it.
No. I can't stomach these basic provisions anymore.
The heart pumps coolant to the fingertips!
I kill from within a cage of steel flesh!
Blood lubricates gears turn muscles pull levers scream...
Carnage at false fingertips!
The squeeze of a trigger, and choir of screams!
I sense the pain through the metal, cry out for merciful death!
More, more, more, more, more, more, more...
I will be painted red by a rainstorm of blood!
A stampede! An unstoppable thirst for death!
I loom... an impending reaper on high.
I impose fear from a distance, toying with their minds!
My presence is itself a harbinger of the end...
Taste mercy for now, so that I may steal it soon!
There is no plenty without want.
I savor the hunt, watching my prey make its move...
A tactic beyond your feeble minds!
<incomprehensible gibberish>
Your child-minds cannot slow me!
One of my machine's steam vents is oddly suspicious...
I get it. We have to choose.
More skulls to crush beneath my heel...
I AM MOST DANGEROUS WOMAN IN HISTORY OF WORLD!
Ten paces at dawn!
Give me your best shot, then I'll give you mine...
Even *I* cannot stop myself, see?!
My wrath demands blood to be spilt- NOW!
This leg is only slowing me down!
FOOLS! COWARDS! TRAITORS!
A dredge does not flee the battlefield!
I'll hunt down any deserters myself!
Yes! Feed the fire that is my hatred!
If only my troops would show the same initiative.
Brutality! A shock to the senses!
My being is too terrifying to be harmed!
A dredge can disarm with thoughts alone!
I stand alone as a goddess in these lands!
If the canary doesn't sing, just shoot it!
Do not steal what is mine!
I'll dismember any whose body-count eclipses mine!
More for me. Thank you, child.
Incompetence, all around me!
The Slayers would have used you for target practice!
More corpses for the mountain!
A battle scar to prove you tried to be useful!
We all bleed!
You'd have made for some challenging target practice.
Like a disgusting flea on a breeze!
Strike back- what are you waiting for?!
I claimed this sector, find your own!
Try to move me. See what happens.
Quiet, child. The grown-ups are killing each other!
I don't accept charity.
Now?! Can you not see that I'm busy?!
Get that out of my face, you cur.
Break, not mend!
I can heal when I'm dead!
Engage the enemy or get out of my sight!
My power is already overwhelming!
Let's make a competition out of it...
Pathetic. I'll blaze a trail of bodies on my own!
No... everything, all this- it was YOUR fault!
Gentlemen... welcome to the Valley.
Your armor needs a stress test.
Do not disturb my reminiscing of combat.
Why don't I just break your fingers until you leave me be?
Hasn't anyone ever told you to stay way from your elders?
Leave me be! I am preparing for the next slaughter!
I am planning a massacre. Stop speaking.
The assault... it will be glorious.
Hunger is for the fat and the weak!
A dredge is a machine inside and out, and does not need food.
I have a power source and do not need another.
Ye not guilty.
I survived the endtimes. This is nothing.
Dredges feel fear. Then we ignore it.
I am the machine, for the machine is alive.
For those that fell, and we who still wander.
I've won wars. This campaign? It'll be won soon enough.
To me, children. I will guide you.
I am your bulwark and your barrage.
They will face us and be flattened as were those before them.
Naught but victory and valor await us.
Stand tall, children. Our unit will crush the enemy with distinction!
Dispatch this rabble and let's be on our way, children.
Strike the vulnerable point for optimal damage!
Time to demonstrate the precision of Ostvenger engineering.
Tragic, really. Our foes are entirely predictable.
Tracking the target...
Coordinate on my target.
Priority threat identified. Go get them, my child.
Witness the fury of the empire that shackled the unknowable!
I am the machine, for it is I!
I will show these savages the power of Ostvengr warfare!
Our hearts pound in our chests! We have the vigor of an army!
Our unit is indivisible, and our power is unmatched!
You would have made for excellent imperial guardsmen.
I am a soldier, through and through!
A dredge does not fall until her unit is dead at her feet!
I am the pinnacle of technological warfare!
Don't let the grey hair fool you.
I didn't endure an apocalypse to die here.
These old bones aren't giving in any time soon.
You'd be surprised how resourceful we were.
Spotted this in the debris.
What did you think was in my bag this whole time?
Hush, child. This isn't much more than a scratch.
I'm glad my needlework hasn't dulled any!
Drink this. It's awful, but it'll help.
I've seen worse in a soldier. You're doing fine.
Straighten your back, dear. You'll feel better when it's time to march.
This will all be done with soon enough, and we'll be relaxing on the ship.
Calibrations completed.
In for the kill.
Watch closely, children.
Not yet- the mission is not yet done...
Tell the Reaper to come back when I'm too old to fight!
Where's the blasted medic?!
Dredge
Omnipistol Blast

TALE OF THE FALL
Fatigues and Oxidized Plating
Training Jacket and Iron Coat
Soldier's Coat and Riveted Steel
Veteran's Garb and Blued Finish
"Zwei" and "Überbaggermaschine"
Field Coat and Hull
Recommissioned Pistol and Prototypes
Service Gun and Standard Loadout
Custom Piece and Calibrated Arms
Campaign Blaster and War Limbs
"Der Harzer" and "Überfaust"
Omni-Pistol and Armaments
A few adjustments here and there, and we're all set.
This is going to get a bit messy...
They won't be making new models any time soon...
The calamity took it all from us. We were our own undoing.

Few Ostvengr soldiers reached the honors of becoming dredge units. Fewer still continued to serve well into the latter portion of their lives. With a collapsed empire behind her, the wandering Dredge has taken up a new calling in a new battlefield.

The Ostvengr had long-considered themselves the gatekeepers of technology, and their dredge units were no exception. The Dredge requires {colour_start|BR_lost_tek}Lost Tek{colour_end} to upgrade her armor and weaponry, which can be gained in the {colour_start|notable}Amber Workshop's Tek Exchange{colour_end}.

Considering that the foundries and factories of the Ostvengr were lost in the calamity, upkeep of remaining equipment has become ever-more critical. Not only has its production become lost to time, but vital materials have become scarce.
Ignores {colour_start|prep_round}Prep Round's{colour_end} ACC Reduction
